abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats Tomas Berdych in semifinals of Qatar Open tennis tournament; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal will break their 23-23 tie in matches against each other when they meet in the Qatar Open final on Saturday in Doha.
snippet: Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal will break their 23-23 tie in matches against each other when they meet in the Qatar Open final on Saturday in Doha....
